answers.text:
Hello,
I have included some sample intranet policies below.
Allegan County, MI
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5541/Computer_and_InternetIntranet_Acceptable_Use_Policy
Tulsa, OK
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2837/The_Tulsa_City_Council_Where_Information_Comes_of_Electronic_Age
Las Vegas, NV has a policy for their employee intranet bulletin board.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302032/Intranet_Bulletin_Board_Policy
I also found a case study from the City of Independence, MO detailing how the use of an intranet system helped save their community money.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/20980/Show_Me_The_Money
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Ashley Greiber
text: Do you have an employee intranet, if so do you have a terms and conditions policy in place?  We just created a new website and with this came the option to have an employee intranet, here we will be able to post things that just employees of the municipality are able to see such as health insurance options, etc.
title: Employee Intranet Policy
